CValue * CIfExpr::Calculate ( ) [virtual]

pre: ret: a new object containing the value of m_e1 if m_guard is a boolean TRUE a new object containing the value of m_e2 if m_guard is a boolean FALSE an new errorvalue if m_guard is not a boolean
